subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: First, Babe Ruth’s single-season home run record was shattered and his 60 home runs were made to sound like a distinctly ordinary number, one almost shrugged off in modern baseball’s environment of souped-up sluggers.
snippet: First, Babe Ruth’s single-season home run record was shattered and his 60 home runs were made to sound like a distinctly ordinary number, one almost shrugged off in modern baseball’s environment of souped-up sluggers.
